page.title: 11FOX HUNTING IN HORTON
page.content: In the Winter many people go out hunting foxes with the Beaufort Hunt.They look very smart and the horses are well groomed.The uniform of the Beaufort Hunt is dark green. Some people do not agree with hunting.They think it is cruel to kill the foxes. Some farmers do not like them riding across their land.Other people think it is good because foxes kill their ducks, chickens and lambs. Our class had a vote.2 people agreed with hunting, 5 were against and 3 could see good and bad in it. We felt that if the foxes were not doing harm they should be allowed to live but if they must be killed a kinder way should be used.We suggest that they could be caught in a cage and then taken to a zoo or given some pills to put them to sleep so that they do not wake up again.
